solution_line_template: From the bride's side, {bride_invited_couples} couples * {guests_per_couple} guests/couple = <<{bride_invited_couples}*{guests_per_couple}={bride_guests}>>{bride_guests} guests attended
From the groom's side, {groom_invited_couples} couples * {guests_per_couple} guests/couple = <<{groom_invited_couples}*{guests_per_couple}={groom_guests}>>{groom_guests} guests attended

Therefore {total_people} guests - ({bride_guests} guests + {groom_guests} guests) = <<{total_people}-({bride_guests}+{groom_guests})={friends_attended}>>{friends_attended} friends attended the reception
